bibl.title: Tears of Repentance or Tears of Gratitude? P. Oxy. 4009, the Gospel of Peter and the Western Text of Luke 7.45-49. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LX, 4009 (= LDAB 4872). - 1. The reconstruction and its parallel. - 2. Conclusions [on the lack of parallel for Luke 7.47b-48 in the papyrus].
bibl.seg: Myllykoski Matti, Tears of Repentance or Tears of Gratitude? P. Oxy. 4009, the Gospel of Peter and the Western Text of Luke 7.45-49. Avec résumé en anglais.
P. Oxy. LX, 4009 (= LDAB 4872). - 1. The reconstruction and its parallel. - 2. Conclusions [on the lack of parallel for Luke 7.47b-48 in the papyrus].
